Author: ravioliriveroli

Author: llsifruby
Text: I'm right there with you :/  Something that worked for me in the past was having my mother prepare food for me and keep me in eyesight of someone at all times (cept for going to the bathroom or changing) so I couldn't restrict or compensate and I'd always have someone to go to for support or distraction if I needed it.  Still it's really hard, especially to start recovery. I wish the best for you and I'm sure the future will be brighter for all of us. Hopefully that is sooner rather than later, because I know too well how hard the I-want-to-recover-but-can't stage is.
